Package view.TUI

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
view.TUI.TUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppGraphics, CommonGoalGraphics, GameGraphics, GameInfoGraphics, LivingRoomGraphics, PersonalGoalGraphics, PlayerChatGraphics, PlayerInfoGraphics, PlayerShelfGraphics
public class TUI extends Object implements AppGraphics, GameGraphics
This class is the Text User Interface of the game.

      Specified by:
      updateGameInfoGraphics in interface GameInfoGraphics
      Parameters:

      firstTurnPlayer - id of the player that has the first turn
      playerOnTurn - id of the player on turn
      isLastTurn - true if the game is in the last round of turns
      pointsValues - points amount of each player
